metadata.dc:author: Medina Solá, J J
Guimerá Bordes, R
Alfaro García, J
Mozota Ortiz, J R
Saiz Calleja, M A
Echeverría Zabalza, M E
metadata.dc:description: The AA. present 2 cases of esophageal perforation due to foreign bodies among 179 esophagoscopies done for removal of other intruders, which required the endoscopic procedure, during a lapse of 4 years. Considerations regarding the treatment and the evolutive course.
metadata.dc:title: A propósito de dos casos de perforación esofágica por cuerpo extraño.
[2 cases of esophageal perforation by foreign bodies].
